name: Worded Out
description:
Spell your way through a dungeon of many mysterious creatures. Grow stronger as you delve deeper into the dungeon. That strength is going to come at the cost of some of your letters!

As you delve deeper, the creatures you encounter will also become more powerful. One mishap can spell your doom.

This game includes:

  • A variety of different enemies to discover!
  • Many different power-ups that synergize together
  • A snake with a big mouth
